name: Invaders (traibergen)
description:
is is my first game, created to learn the game engine 'Stencyl'.

Control it by  using the arrows keys or A and D keys to move and the Z or Space Bar to shoot.

I will add more levels in the future.

Change log:
Version 1.0.1

  • Added the option to control the game with the A and D keys
  • Changed the screen that shows when you win the game
